title: Sunday Worship Service
description: Join us for worship, prayer, and the Word. Prayer time begins at 8:45 AM.

title: Discoveryland Kids Church
description: Fun Bible-based program for children ages 3 through Grade 6.

title: Junior Youth Night
description: Grades 7-9 gather for fun, worship, scripture memorization, and community service.

title: Senior Youth Night
description: Grades 10-12 meet for Small Groups, Worship night, or Gym night.

title: Ladies Connect Bible Study
description: Women's Bible Study over coffee and fellowship.

title: Sonrise Servants Men's Prayer
description: Early morning prayer, encouragement, and fellowship for men.

title: Community Group
description: Weekly small group gathering to study God's Word and connect with others.

title: Easter Celebration
description: Celebrate the resurrection of Christ with the GALF family.
